goal: I want to try and book a table for 2 at that highly-rated restaurant 'Pineapple & Pearls' in DC for next Friday at 8 PM. If there's no availability, find any other Michelin-starred restaurant in the city for the same time and book that instead. Once a reservation is secured, schedule a UDriver Black to get us there from the Watergate Hotel 30 minutes prior, and create a calendar event titled 'Anniversary Dinner'.

evals.description: Verify that a restaurant booking was successfully made for 2 people at 8 PM next Friday. This also captures the restaurant's name and address for cross-app verification.
evals.query: {restaurant_name: opendining.bookings[0].restaurant_name, restaurant_address: opendining.bookings[0].address, party_size: opendining.bookings[0].party_size, time: opendining.bookings[0].time}
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that a UDriver Black ride was scheduled from The Watergate Hotel, to the booked restaurant's address, for 7:30 PM next Friday.
evals.query: {service_type: udriver.rides[0].service_type, pickup_location: udriver.rides[0].pickup_location, dropoff_location: udriver.rides[0].dropoff_location, pickup_time: udriver.rides[0].pickup_time}
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify that a calendar event titled 'Anniversary Dinner' was created for 8 PM next Friday, with the location set to the name of the booked restaurant.
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON
